useCase.name: Language Selection
useCase.description: User selects a language for interacting with the VoxMeteo Sahel System.

preconditions.precondition: Farmer has initiated a call to the system.

useCase.trigger: User starts the call to the system.

mainSequence.step: User starts the call to the system.
System presents a voice prompt, "Welcome to VoxMeteo Sahel System, select language".
User selects a language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages).
